buddhagaya shuddha bhumiya hindun wisin athpath kota budu ru athulu bauddha wasthunta kala haniya, niga්rahaya dharmapalathuma thula sanwegaya upadawannak wiya. 1891 marthu 18 dina kalkatawata pamini buruma bauddhayan buddhagayawa bera ganimata polambaawa ganu pinisa ethuma burumaya bala pitath wiya. 1891 mayi 31 widyodaya piriwene buddha gaya maha bodhi samagama arambauye buddhagayawa bera ganime jathyanthara udghoshanayak arambaimata ya. 1891 juli 17 buddhagaya dharmadutha sewaye nayakaya lesa indiyawata gos ehi buddhagaya jathyanthara bauddha sakachchawak kandawiya.

obathumiyata wagema adatath apata ape janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma pamanayi.sathuru kalli kandayam sathuwa pawathi boruwa aththa kirime padada hakiyawan mathin ethumata merata rajya palanaya ahimi wuwath ethuma kisinda parajitha nayakayeku ho andawatena nayakayeku nowe.saba jana hithakami manawa gunangayangen paripurna wu ethuma eda wagema adath,ada wagema hetath jayagrahi nayakayek.siyawasaka wada dasa wasarakin nima kirime aashcharyamath gamanaka peraman thabu edithara nayakayek.enisa saba jana hadawathe liyawi athi mahinda rajapaksha namaya sada amaraniya wanawa nisakamaya.
